%c[0,153,255,255]Zombified%c[0,140,140,140] stalkers are those who have fallen under the effects of a strong psi-field.
 
%c[0,0,255,30]Information%c[0,140,140,140]
 
These creatures lack the higher functions of the brain and act solely on residual reflexes and skills, incapable of conscious activity, and having a high threshold for pain.
 
The mental and physical health of a zombified stalker will gradually deteriorate over time, eventually losing the last of their humanity, and becoming the mutant known as a zombie.
 
Unlike the mutant however, zombified stalkers are capable of using weapons and tools, and are frequently seen working together in groups, or with soldiers of the Monolith.
